text: Campomanesia phaea is a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. It is found in the states of Paraná, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo. In Brazil its fruit is called cambuci and the tree cambucizeiro. Not to be confused with cambucá. ==References== phaea Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Flora of Paraná (state) Category:Flora of Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Flora of São Paulo (state) Category:Tropical fruit Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Campomanesia phaea
